skdetail:

Invocation Name: today's real talk
des: Real estate markets change and grow, which means you might need a little help if you want to stay current in terms of the real estate market in North Carolina. Here at Today’s Real Talk, we delve into topics that are all things real estate, like affordability, taxes, technology, the current real estate market, legal concepts and so much more. If you are looking for real solutions for today’s hottest real estate issues, be sure to tune in and follow!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
